name: Cool: Chill n' Calm
description:
Follow along Sealy on a very cool, calm and chill adventure!

I'm sure nothing will happen that makes this game anything else than super calm and chill!

Eat some watermelon, listen to some chill ukulele and just have a good time!

Control Sealy with the arrow keys!

Was supposed to be part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the "Out of Control" theme. Did however run out of time then and only recently got the energy to finish and publish it.

A pretty small, simple and honestly pretty bad game, but the first one I've ever "finished". So even though it's far from a masterpiece I am very proud. :)

And I am aware the game features bugs, such as animations running in the wrong direction hehe... But please comment any bugs you can find and I will try to fix 'em!

Oh and the last frame is pretty messed up hehe but dooooon't worryyyyy about that :D
